segments.text: Did you hear what happened in the Scott case ? Some of the sensitive material were leaked to the press . Now every newspapers is all over it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh ... I bet the firm is fuming . Do they know who spilled the beans ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sure they have their suspicions ; there were only a few of the senior level layers who were privy to the case details .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of repercussions will there be for the people who are held responsible ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sure there'll be canned ! And there also might be some legal consequences .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why would the person who told have problems with the law ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because whoever let the cat out of the bag was breaking client confidentiality .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't think about that . That's pretty serious . Are there investigators working on finding out who it was ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sure management is on top of it .
segments.speaker: S1
